name: Ability Score and Modifier
description:
Each creature has six ability scores — Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma — each ranging from 1 to 20 for most adventurers. Each ability also has a modifier, derived from the score: (score - 10) / 2, rounded down. The modifier is what you add to a D20 Test.

### Ability Scores and Modifiers

| Score | Modifier |
|---|---|
| 1 | -5 |
| 2-3 | -4 |
| 4-5 | -3 |
| 6-7 | -2 |
| 8-9 | -1 |
| 10-11 | +0 |
| 12-13 | +1 |
| 14-15 | +2 |
| 16-17 | +3 |
| 18-19 | +4 |
| 20-21 | +5 |
| 22-23 | +6 |
| 24-25 | +7 |
| 26-27 | +8 |
| 28-29 | +9 |
| 30 | +10 |

### Ability Score Point Cost

| Score | Cost |
|---|---|
| 8 | 0 |
| 9 | 1 |
| 10 | 2 |
| 11 | 3 |
| 12 | 4 |
| 13 | 5 |
| 14 | 7 |
| 15 | 9 |
